snippet: Mayor Mitch Landrieu of New Orleans said Tuesday that a special team of police officers would reopen hundreds of mishandled cases uncovered by a city inspector general’s audit that was released last week.
abstract: New Orleans Mayor Mitch Landrieu says special team of police officers will reopen hundreds of mishandled cases uncovered by a city inspector general’s audit.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Mitch Landrieu of New Orleans said Tuesday that a special team of police officers would reopen hundreds of mishandled cases uncovered by a city inspector general’s audit that was released last week.

headline.main: Louisiana: New Orleans Police to Reopen Hundreds of Cases
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: New Orleans Police to Reopen Hundreds of Cases
